scripts.d: npm run dx && npm run translate:compile && npm run dev
scripts.dx: npm i && npm run dx:up && npm run prisma:migrate-dev && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.ci: turbo run build --filter=@tiquo/remix && turbo run test:e2e
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:generate -w @tiquo/prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate-dev: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:migrate-dev -w @tiquo/prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate-deploy: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:migrate-deploy -w @tiquo/prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate-reset: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:migrate-reset -w @tiquo/prisma
scripts.prisma:seed: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:seed -w @tiquo/prisma
scripts.prisma:studio: npm run with:env -- npm run prisma:studio -w @tiquo/prisma
scripts.reset:hard: npm run clean && npm i && npm run prisma:generate
scripts.precommit: npm install && git add package.json package-lock.json
scripts.trigger:dev: npm run with:env -- npx trigger-cli dev --handler-path="/api/jobs"
scripts.translate: npm run translate:extract && npm run translate:compile
